lender.name: Don & Juanita
lender.occupation: He-Retired from IT / She-Active Medical Clerk
lender.loan_because: We are excited about assisting small aspiring businesses and watching them reach for their dreams and goals.

lender.name: marisa
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping people who are willing to help themelves and those living around them. My grandparents were subsistence farmers with a few cash crops. My parents owned a small corner store for about 10 years. I know and respect the amount of work invovled with these venutres and I am blessed to be able to help these hard working people.
lender.occupational_info: My job is as a public service lawyer. My work is as a servant of the Lord.

lender.name: Manuokalewa
lender.loan_because: it is my duty to God to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am the chef on staff at a mega church. I prepare meals for conferences and teach adults with special needs, how to cook.

lender.name: Allison & Joe
lender.loan_because: We want to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Joe writes for newspapers and magazines, and teaches writing. He aspires to be a novelist. Allison works for the Canadian government promoting equity in the workplace.

lender.name: Bart
lender.loan_because:
1. You should always model the behavior you would like to see repeated.
2. Helping a parent in business will allow them to provide more opportunities for their children.
lender.occupational_info: I teach the third graders of today and the leaders of tomorrow.

lender.name: Ranga
lender.loan_because: I can and everybody who could should.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Engineer responsible for testing and approving construction materials for large projects in a major city.

lender.name: Bibi and Phil
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer, my husband is a social studies teacher

lender.name: john
lender.loan_because: good karma--hopefully i can make a difference for someone..
lender.occupational_info: new at this...

lender.name: M.O. Swain
lender.loan_because: People in this world who want to do positive things need help. My small contribution can make a world of difference for people who are less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a school that helps young people obtain their G.E.D. and continue their education beyond.

lender.name: Rainette
lender.loan_because: I care. You are important to my husband (Jesus) and I and we feel that what you want to do is important and we believe in you and your dream. God Bless and Good Luck!
lender.occupational_info: I do not work now outside of the home. When I did I was in the medical firld. My husband works with computers. He also loves photography.

lender.name: Phoebe
lender.loan_because: Jesus Christ gives abundantly to me.
lender.occupational_info: Medical student

lender.name: K J
lender.loan_because: Because I feel blessed to live a comfortable, fulfilling life and to be able to help others. I come from a very humble background and people helped me along the way. I want to give back and encourage others to follow their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I own a company called Learning Gurus. When companies need to train and educate their employees, we help them find great trainers, writers, project managers, and technology experts.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I can help someone!

lender.name: mamed
lender.loan_because: i am kurd man from syria.olso i a doctor no i kanet werker bikos i don.t have many i wen.t helep from iny man 4159567389474767 cerd finans in turkya
lender.occupational_info: i wen.t meke hospital for kurdish piopil

lender.name: Ali
lender.loan_because: My salary hardly cover my daily needs, and have got monthly instalment to pay for 12 years.
lender.occupational_info: I have 30 yreas experiance in Telecommunication Planning and Network Desing.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: It allows me to connect to the world at large: to look beyond my town, state, country limits.

lender.name: Rose
lender.loan_because: We, who have so much, have a duty to help others. Kiva allows us to see our loans work.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a nurse reviewing the accuracy of hospital bills.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I totally do NOT recommend this website because they use Paypal, and it's too hard to get your money back, and with Paypal, you may NEVER get your money back. I'll never lend money again here, I'm done.

lender.name: Ronald & Theresa
lender.loan_because: We want to help people better themselves on a one to one basis

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I live with the reminder of people hurt and in need everyday.

lender.name: david
lender.loan_because: I am grateful to God for the many blessings in my life. This is a great way to say thanks.
lender.occupational_info: I own and operate an automotive parts rebuilding business

lender.name: Luci and Jim
lender.loan_because: We've been very fortunate and want to assist others to become successful too.
lender.occupational_info: We rent movies from the companies that make them, show them in our movie theater and sell tickets and movie food to our loyal customers. We are in "show business" in a small resort town in the mountains of Colorado.

lender.name: Kuranes
lender.loan_because: tengo gusto de ayudar a la gente

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: it is the right and just thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I answer the phones, greet clients and perform a wide variety of administrative tasks in a law firm of 20 attorneys and staff personnel.

lender.name: Kai
lender.loan_because: It feels good to share my bounty with other women.

lender.name: Grace
lender.loan_because: People who are willing to work to make their lives better deserve a way to do that. Kiva offers a simple way that I can help.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of the other people on this planet, if only in a small way. The way of life we enjoy in the United States usually comes at the expense of others - usually by "acquiring" their country's resources and/or "encouraging" them to accept trade deals that only benefit the US and/or propping up some oppressive puppet government.
lender.occupational_info: I am a former member of the US Military and am now self employed.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: I want to give people a hand up not a handout.

lender.name: Arne
lender.occupational_info: I'm running online surveys and assessment-center for people manager

lender.name: Belle
lender.loan_because: Microloans allow us to help hardworking people around the world to thrive in their businesses and their lives.

lender.name: Yahn-Rurng
lender.loan_because: My buddy Richard introduced me to Kiva - he's a sensitive liberal who drinks fair trade starbucks, plans vacations to eco resorts, and strives to make the world a better place for all.

lender.name: Abdiwali
lender.loan_because: Micro financing is one way I can make a difference, and can fulfill my share of responsibility towards helping the human family.

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: Everyone with a realistic idea and a good plan should have access to capital.
lender.occupational_info: Using commercial real estate to meet people's everyday needs.

lender.name: Cris
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping women everywhere to find their independent and entrepreneurial spirit
lender.occupational_info: I help young children learn to communicate with their family and others

lender.name: Jeff & Myrcia
lender.loan_because: "All humans have the inner capacity not only to care for themselves but also to contribute to increasing the well-being of the world as a whole" Mohammad Yunis

lender.name: Babette
lender.occupational_info: Assist in communications between Deaf and hearing worlds in daily life situations.

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: It's one way to give back a little of what God has given me.
lender.occupational_info: Retired public servant, now voluteering in gov't office

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I love their entrepreneurial spirit !
lender.occupational_info: Computer Consultant

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great concept where people can help others who have the drive to be successful and become self sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I test aircraft.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: It is better to give than receive.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: I want to share and Kiva helps me to do it

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: This is a way I can help others in many diffrent places.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.occupation: Travel & Logistics Coordinator for Intl Non Profit

lender.name: Kevin and Teresa Barnard
lender.loan_because: Kiva made this so easy and we believe people just need an opportunity to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Environmental compliance (Kevin) Credit Union Finance (Teresa)

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Helping someone else means more (and the satisfaction lasts longer) than does spending money on myself, and the small sum of money involved goes so much further in the developing world than it does here.

lender.name: Ed719
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference in the world to help those that want to help themselves. I feel like my life is blessed, so I'd like to empower others to fulfill any dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Work hard...play hard

lender.name: Jacob
lender.loan_because: Germantown, MD

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I Know how Hard it can be to start a Business and for these people its a way to Support there Families and a way to Have a better Life. Changing the world One Small Deed at a time!
lender.occupational_info: I Own and Operate a Oriental Grocery Store In GA and My Business has been good to me and i hope i can Help someone Fulfill their Dream of Business Ownership

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I like the direct connection to entrepreneurs. I love the idea of lending a hand as opposed to giving a hand out.
lender.occupational_info: I sell computer softeware to help companies be more effectvie.

lender.name: Skip & Donna
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed in our lives & have seen first hand the loving caring people in poor countries such as Mexico who just need a hand up.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: To be a blessing for someone in need for the glory of God.
lender.occupational_info: Retired -Sales Rep. for over 33 years in the home furnishings field.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: I loan because I was blessed with the opportunity to do so. I was blessed with the ability to live a life free from hunger and oppressive poverty. If with this small amount I help someone liberate themselves from the shackles of poverty, the loan will pay back much more than just money.

lender.name: Lynette
lender.loan_because: Kiva lets me help others, the way people have helped my family in the past.

lender.name: Mike and Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want peace
lender.occupational_info: I love all people

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: We have to start somewhere...

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Jayne
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for my four healthy children and all the opportunities that we have been blessed with.
lender.occupational_info: I teach young children who live in the city about living on a farm and caring for the farm animals. We have horses, sheep, goats, chickens, rabbits and a pig. Most of these children have had no contact with animals except for dogs and cats. I also enjoy sewing, knitting, and crafts. I admire anyone who has the drive to make their life better for their family.

lender.name: Skylar
lender.loan_because: My Mommy and Daddy want me to learn about the world and help other people.
lender.occupational_info: I like to play!

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because:
This is a great way to help people improve their living conditions. I can't afford to offer much, but the bit of money I can lend is doing some real good all over the world.
I started out with just a few loans because that's all I could afford. But after each loan is repaid, I lend the money to more people through Kiva. By doing this, I've been able to help 40 people so far! It's a wonderful feeling to know that I've done some good in the world.
With everyone offering what they can, it adds up to make a true difference to people in need. What a wonderful thing Kiva is!

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: My world, no matter how big or small, will be better because I am here.
lender.occupational_info: Working full-time, going to law school at night, paying student loans, with four cute kids and a very supportive wife.

lender.name: Glen
lender.loan_because: It is a way to partner with others such that they can work to improve their livlihood.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Materals Manager. I buy materials from suppliers such that factories can produce their products.

lender.name: Roger & Janet
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to make a little money have a large impact.

lender.name: Kenzie
lender.loan_because: I can't think of any better ways to help people.

lender.name: Mary Ann
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I believe it is a worthwhile efort to invest in the hopes and dreams of people who have something to contribute.

lender.name: ahmed
lender.loan_because: MY RELEGEN ISLAM ASK FOR HELPE OTHER BROTHERS FOR US THOSE NEED HELP
lender.occupational_info: AM TRAINNING SUP. AND SUPERVICE ON SMALL BUSNESS IN MY CITY

lender.name: Janene
lender.loan_because: So many people in this world need a helping hand. And microcredit is a very easy way of offering assistance to those that need it.

lender.name: Karen, Eli & Jorn
lender.loan_because: Together we will change the world!

lender.name: Arthur
lender.loan_because: I learned about Kiva from NPR's Marketplace program, and the concept fascinated me.
lender.occupational_info: I support people who write computer software.

lender.name: Kallie
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I build cargo planes that are in use worldwide.

lender.name: Karyn, Allan & Sam
lender.loan_because: In celebration of our 16th wedding anniversary, Karyn & Allan want to do our small part to eliminate poverty, with a focus on helping women and their families. Sam is not a fan of the microlending idea yet, but hopefully this can be a teaching opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: Allan is a history professor and author of "The Keys to the White House." Karyn is a writer and activist. Sam is a scholar and an athlete. He plays football and lacrosse.

lender.name: Jean-Luc
lender.loan_because: The strong should support the one in need! Supporting Kiva is one step in the right direction.
lender.occupational_info: Weekly: Business Advisor & Program Manager Weekend: Networker

lender.name: Ryan & Susan
lender.loan_because: We have made great success with loans we were granted during our education and careers.
lender.occupational_info: Rewarding!

lender.name: Vasu
lender.loan_because: Manavasevae Madhavaseva (Service to Humanity is Service to GOD)

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: Leveraging the potential of individual.
lender.occupational_info: Monitoring goals and tracking the costs to accomplish them.

lender.name: Deanna & Ram
lender.loan_because: It's a small way to make a big difference.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: It seems to be one of the best ways to help improve the quality of peoples lives.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I care and I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Lin Family
lender.loan_because: Blessing from God

lender.name: The Williams Family
lender.loan_because: We have been very fortunate and think that this is without a doubt a great way to share our good fortune and involve our whole family.
lender.occupational_info:
I am an entrepreneur who has been through several start up companies and always had investors who had faith in our visions.
My current organization is an internet development company that specializes in working with non-profit organizations on e-communications initiatives.

lender.name: scott
lender.loan_because: It is a small thing that I can do to help others in need. This world can be a better place for everyone,if everyone would lend a hand to some one else.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Architect in San Diego, California

lender.name: Daniel Durrant
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of creativity and innovation. When humanity is resourceful and generous with each other anything can be accomplished.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: I believe in people helping people.
lender.occupational_info: Process environmental data and display them on maps to help scientists understand the spatial distribution of pollutant concentrations.

lender.name: Gladys Rose
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work 2 part-time jobs. I am an artist and I work in an office.

lender.name: Grandma
lender.loan_because: The profiles/pictures make the people real and you get a sense that your small loan goes a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I work on the fiscal side of a non-profit coalition that services rape crisis centers.

lender.name: NeoAgeBoy
lender.loan_because: I believe in the cause.
lender.occupational_info:
Trained as an electrical engineer, Neal enjoys his current work developing software for a large defense contractor. Frequently, he would exercise his managerial power to allocate resources in order to complete projects on time. One of Neal's favorite quote is,
"The difference between rats and people is that rats learn from experience." -B. F. Skinner
As a result, sometimes he can be seen observing the rodents at work to gain insight to their quality.

lender.name: Heather Hayes
lender.loan_because:
It's the right thing to do. I'm making this loan in my mom Barbara's honor. Happy Mothers' Day!
I'll never forget people who have helped me get a "leg up" in life: Pat of "Pat's Shoe Repair" in Kilmainham, Dublin: Credit on a shoe repair goes a long way; a mysterious man with a white suit and a white Mercedes, in 1985 La Mancha, who filled our empty gas tank when we were broke and ran out of gas in a beat-up Renault 4--- and hundreds of others. Thanks to you.
lender.occupational_info: Day-job: interpreter in federal courts. Also musician, screenwriter, etc.,

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: This is the most direct way to raise the standard of living for others in the world, it takes so little to dramatically influence people's lives! If enough capital is put into each of these places everyone's life becomes better.
lender.occupational_info: We print & package direct mail advertising (aka junk mail)

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I believe that the best hope for the world is to invest in the minds and lives of people in parts of the world that need innovation and hope to solve their problems. And in doing so, they might even find a solution for a problem in our part of the world.

lender.name: Maureen & Jean-Luc
lender.loan_because: We want to help women in developing countries
lender.occupational_info: Maureen is an artist (painting, jewelry) who works from home and Jean-Luc works for a large computer company

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: ...loaning assists people to achieve their goals and hopes in a manner that builds confidence, integrity, and a value of independence.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: A little goes a long,long way for these folk.

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: Since the concept of micro-loans first started being discussed widely I've thought what a fantastic idea they were, especially for women in developing countries who might not always have access to financial help for whatever reason. Now I can participate in lending which is great! I know the money goes straight to the person I have chosen without any strings attached other than fair interest. I am able to see how it's being used and know that it has helped a person realise their dream when it comes back to me - and then I can loan it out again - I like that bit the best :)
lender.occupational_info: I'm finishing up my PhD in Archaeology, working on the prehistoric diet of Aitutaki in the Cook Islands.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: I am making a difference with my Grandchildren.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for the safetly of the people in my care that they will not get hurt from the medications that they take. I am a chemist, drugist or pharmacist depending which country you are in.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people directly to help themselves. I stay away from handouts, but this is a venture I can really get behind. It builds trust, pride, and individual power in a way that donations can't.

lender.name: Le groupe dextor limitée
lender.loan_because: The dextor group is determined to grow its shareholder equity while ensuring a dynamic management of long-term investments and ensuring its social responsibility towards the communities.
lender.occupational_info:
The dextor group is a management and holding company with interest in private and public companies.
It is also actively involved in the community by actively participating in non profit organizations.

lender.name: Katie & Drew
lender.loan_because: A small amount of money can make a big differnce here.

lender.name: Deana and Yoo-Shin
lender.loan_because: In honour of our wedding guests.
lender.occupational_info: Computer programmer and Lawyer.

lender.name: Nadir
lender.loan_because: It is an easy and affordable way to assist, one step at a time, in the comfort of your home, thousands of miles away.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a Canadian Bank and manage the Bank's investments.

lender.name: Jay, Gloria and family
lender.loan_because: We want other people to have the same opportunities that we have had and to remember that Americans can be a generous people.
lender.occupational_info: Almost-retired small business owner (Jay) and retired elementary school teacher (Gloria)

lender.name: Abigail
lender.loan_because: I feel inspired to share my wealth with others in a sustainable way.

lender.name: Lyle
lender.loan_because: I have enough stuff in my life. It's nice to be able to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I inspect boilers and pressure vessels to make sure they are safe. I go to alot of chemical and petro-chemical plants.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: Big changes can be made with small steps
lender.occupational_info: I treat dogs and cats for their illnesses so that they can live longer, healthier lives.

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in this lifetime. I am agressive in every endeavor that I pursue and I like watching other's realize their dreams. Secretly, I aspire to be a budding entrepreneur one day...myself...but until then, I will watch Kiva recipients do just that...
lender.occupational_info: I inspect facilities to insure the public's safety.

lender.name: Jeff and Family
lender.loan_because: I want to impact the lives of people around the world by sharing my prosperity through microloans.
lender.occupational_info: I sell electronic components to design engineers.

lender.name: Fisk
lender.loan_because: it's fun.
lender.occupational_info: I design systems to heat and cool buildings.

lender.name: Janez
lender.loan_because: I enjoy it...

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to give a hand up.

lender.name: Benito
lender.loan_because: I see this as one means of fulfilling the Great Commission; I have been blessed to be a blessing.
lender.occupational_info: I am a university professor and a retired US Army Officer. I am a social work educator and value independence and self-sufficiency.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I'm making a difference without removing accountability. It feels good!

lender.name: Harris Family
lender.loan_because: I believe that work, done well, gives people great power in their lives.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: The world needs people with dreams, and my dream is to help others realize thier dreams
lender.occupational_info: I worked for years to make a living, and finally achieved a goal that others may look at as adding more work, but to me it's a dream come true, - I'm a Micro-farmer (Not much land but a lot of satisfaction) some people would just call me a gardener..

lender.name: Team Devereaux
lender.loan_because: It feels right. We have so much, they have so little. It's the least we can do.
lender.occupational_info: We work in retail and finance.

lender.name: Naomi
lender.occupational_info: I write materials that are used to teach MBA students.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because:
“Give to the one who asks you, and do not turn away from the one who wants to borrow from you.” -Matthew 5:42
“If anyone has material possessions and sees his brother in need but has no pity on him, how can the love of God be in him?” -1 John 3:17

lender.name: Leni
lender.loan_because: We are glad we can help out a little bit, but YOU - the borrowers -- are the ones who do the real work. May your efforts bring forth good fruits!
lender.occupational_info: My hobby is cooking and developing recipes that are healthy and easy to make - especially recipes with foods that help to prevent cancer. So I write a blog, http://monamifood.wordpress.com/about/ with simple ideas for preparing dishes that include anti-cancer foods.

lender.name: Worker
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of people helping each other direct.
lender.occupational_info: I am business owner just like you.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy helping others.

lender.name: Peter & Julie
lender.loan_because: It's fun to see people in less fortunate countries succeed in life.
lender.occupational_info:
Peter manages the environmental and safety responsibilities of a small company in the United States.
Julie works for the local county government.

lender.name: Beer Cheese Mike
lender.loan_because: I love the concept of micro lending and I'm thankful for Kiva to give me the opportunity to help others provide for themselves, their families and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a local company that brews craft beer. In my spare time I am starting a company that makes beer cheese. Hopefully the karma I've been putting in here will return to my own endeavor.

lender.name: Jakub
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: read, read and read a lot

lender.name: Bret
lender.loan_because: it allows me to fight for justice and alleviate hunger.
lender.occupational_info: I design, build and opperate hotel and restaurant developments. My vision is "To be the primary source of hospitality in the communities we serve by providing our guests the best possible experience and by being good neighbors."

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to be an entrepreneur; it can be exciting and challenging, and also difficult at times. I want to help hard-working people make their lives better for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who have pain or injuries. By massaging and stretching their muscles, I help increase their circulation and facilitate healing. I also have my own business as a wellness home consultant with a wellness company called Nikken. When I am not working, I enjoy time with my husband raising my 4 children, ages 8, 6, 4, and 2months.

lender.name: "G"
lender.loan_because: I can and ... it is fun to have my own private "Marshall Plan" for Africa. Hmmmm...or should I say: "G's Plan" ? ;-)

lender.name: Sylvia
lender.loan_because: I am live on this earth

lender.name: Sheryl
lender.loan_because: My heart and my spirit moves me to help someone fulfill their dream.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a law firm and assist the attorney by preparing the necessary paperwork to be filed in court and I correspond with the businesses that we provide services to.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I have never had the ability or funding to start my own business, but feel that being able to help an entrepreneur realize his or her dream can make a real difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that manufactures healthcare equipment like X-ray machines, CT Scanners, etc... My responsibility is leading the team that keeps the computer systems running that make sure our equipment in hospitals gets serviced.

lender.name: Sunil
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate and thankful for the opportunities that my parents have provided for me and I only hope to provide someone less fortunate with a hand up. Donations are one thing but empowering someone to provide for themselves and their family is the best feeling in the world.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to support the efforts of those trying to better their lives by honest and hard work.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a team to facilitate educational exchange as well as cultural dialog through media

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: for American's, it is such a simple way to help real people. I hope my contribution makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I have a small design firm with an office in my home. We specialize in preserving and adaptively reusing historic buildings.

lender.name: Diane
lender.occupational_info: housewife

lender.name: Erin & Ryan
lender.loan_because: We want to thank our wedding guests with something that will help make the world a little better.

lender.name: Jim,Connie & Angel
lender.loan_because: By helping others we will be furthering world peace and prosperity.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I like small success stories.

lender.name: chidi
lender.loan_because: I need $500 dollars to expand my bussiness for my Book store
lender.occupational_info: I am a student literature envagelist who is a representative of home health educational services, working with an international firm that supplies some printed pages of books for sales e.g Health Books like Encyclopedia of medicinal plants and Health & Education for the family, Bibles, Family life syle books and so on. I want to established a book store where this books will be available for sales.

lender.name: Laurel
lender.occupational_info: Current student at Georgetown University

lender.name: Lien
lender.loan_because: I love capitalism.

lender.name: Malcolm & Ann
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves support to realise their potential.
lender.occupational_info: Working with computers and the internet.

lender.name: Tactics3d
lender.loan_because: We are blessed so we can be a blessing.

lender.name: Jodie
lender.loan_because: I am doing this for my grandaughter so she will understand the importance of giving and sharing of what she has so much of. She is a loving 9 year old who enjoys gymnastics and being with family and friends.

lender.name: rommel
lender.loan_because: simply want to help .

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I believe in paying it forward. If everyone gave something, time money, goods or just a word of hope, the world will be a better place.

lender.name: lori
lender.loan_because: there are so many people that need a helping hand. I want to be a part of the solution, rather than just commenting on all the problems in our world.

lender.name: M & D
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: We work with students at a college.

lender.name: arthur
lender.loan_because: I want to create lots of lots of jobs for our people in south africa. I assisting consumers who are over in-debted, please asisst me.
lender.occupational_info: over africa

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I want to help women gain a foothold in their communities through business.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: In my life, there were times when I needed help and it wasn't there and there were times when I needed help and it was there. Having someone offer a helping hand is much better than trying to face the world alone, ill-prepared and unequipped. I hope by this small gesture, my help can ripple through many lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work to ensure that foster children in New York State receive necessary medical services to which they are entitled.

lender.name: Laurent
lender.whereabouts: Newcastle upon Tyne Tyne and Wear

lender.name: Mireille
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves to be financially free and I would like to help others achieve that.
lender.occupational_info: At the moment I am an English tutor. I tutor according to the Oxford Learning Center English Second Language program. I enjoy working with the kids. In my spare time I am an infopreneur. I have my own website on the Internet, trying to help others feel great about themselves... http://www.feel-great-about-yourself.com

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I now have time to learn to play the piano...badly so far, but with slow improvement.

lender.name: Michael
lender.occupational_info: I try to keep the big guys from picking on the little guys.

lender.name: thomas & myfanwy
lender.loan_because: born on an easy side of Planet
lender.occupational_info: trying to help

lender.name: Jo & Lee
lender.loan_because: I believe this program has a better "bang for a buck" than other programs we have used.

lender.name: Karin
lender.loan_because: Others have helped me, and now it's my turn.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Children and Family Services by providing clerical assistance to social workers who assist children who have been abused and/or neglected.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: each of us doing a little can help others achieve a lot.

lender.name: Richard and Susan
lender.loan_because: We love the people of the countries where our borrowers live, and very much want to help them succeed
lender.occupational_info: We no longer work, but we have a full life - playing music, painting, traveling.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to help someone across the planet take care of themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: I am a lawyer. I represent people in claims against institutions.

lender.name: John B. Perre
lender.loan_because: Agape
lender.occupational_info: Family Harmony & Philanthropy

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: It is a pleasure to help others. We are all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: I help people operate thier business better.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: it gives the recipient a greater sense of pride and accomplishment than simply making a gift.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a major airline, and have traveled throughout third world countries and seen the huge impact a small sum of money can have.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: We are teaching people how to fish!
lender.occupational_info: Retired

lender.name: irakly kaveladze
lender.loan_because: I like the concept of microcredit.
lender.occupational_info: I help to structure international business projects

lender.name: Peter & Jake
lender.loan_because: We would like to share our resources so others can realize new opportunities for their families. We enjoy travel, and learning about all the amazing cultures in the world.
lender.occupational_info: Peter helps rural communities in the Northwest United States create jobs through clean energy, such as wind and solar power, geothermal energy, and biofuels and biopower. Jake is a budding graphic designer and baseball fan.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I am blessed and so I bless. It is as simple as that.
lender.occupational_info: I sell homes

lender.name: John & Elaine
lender.loan_because: It's an effective, free-market method of eliminating poverty.

lender.name: George & Mecca
lender.loan_because: Fair and reasonable loans empower people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: We love to travel. We have seen first-hand how ownership can change not only an individual's life, and that of his family; but how it impacts the entire community and ultimately the culture.

lender.name: Bhavesh
lender.loan_because: it gives me a chance to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a financial company- basically in implementation of ERP systems and business intelligence products

lender.name: Bob and Gayle
lender.loan_because: I want to make a significant difference in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: Fun and imaginative

lender.name: Kaye
lender.occupation: retired financial analyst who does volunteer work
lender.loan_because: My faith requires me to love my neighbor (brother/sister) as myself and this is a way to show love.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer with a group that grants wishes to seriously ill children, I work at a shelter for battered women, and I talk with people in crisis on a suicide phone line.

lender.name: Cambridge CF Church
lender.loan_because: God first gave to us.
lender.occupational_info: We're a multiethnic church in Cambridge, MA, USA

lender.name: Mehul & Ravisha
lender.loan_because: Kiva gives us an avenue to reach people who have great need. We get the great satisfaction from lending the money through Kiva. We are happy and proud to be part of this amazing network. KIVA, keep up the good work!

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: There are many people out there that just need a little help to be self sufficient.

lender.name: Gregor
lender.loan_because: I grew up in SE Asia and have seen poverty at first hand. I was lucky to be born into a white, middle class, European family and I would hope someone would loan to me if the situation was reversed.
lender.occupational_info: I help ensure my company can solve problems for our customers by recommending certain computer hardware and software.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the chance to succeed.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: Real people can truly help real people.
lender.occupational_info: I develop electronic products, and train other engineers in their use.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: Money loaned, repaid, and loaned again will help many more than a gift through an agency.

lender.name: Alfred
lender.loan_because: Can directly impact the lives of others in a positive manner.

lender.name: Jane & Dennis
lender.loan_because: We loan because we have both worked with lots of wonderful farmers and agriculturalists in Latin American and throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: Jane works in a museum located in a wonderful Art Deco train station. Dennis is semi-retired but continues his work on palm trees and teaching as a substitute in the local public school system.

lender.name: Frank and Corri
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do :-D
lender.occupational_info: The Mom in our little family works in tech support at a university while finishing up her BA; the Dad is a grad student and a cinema technician; and the kiddos are having fun in 1st Grade and getting the hang of that potty thing, respectively.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: The opportunity to help people help themselves is very seductive and rewarding. Honest people are worth the risk!
lender.occupational_info: Self employed in hospitality and entertainment.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I want to empower women in the workplace... We cannot survive without help and support from others, even if those people are across the world!
lender.occupational_info: I am in college for music performance, and I someday hope to teach at a college. I currently teach college-level music at the college which I attend, and I am also a church musician for a local church.

lender.name: Adam R.
lender.loan_because: I loan because I love to help people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I lend money.

lender.name: Shannara
lender.loan_because: ... the difference between charity and Kiva-ing is like giving a man a fish and giving him a fishing rod. I love to help people help themselves.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Why wouldn't we? The computers we use right now are individually worth at least twice as much as most people earn in a year. (50 percent of the world's population earns less than 2 dollars a day) Seems like a good enough reason to me.
lender.occupational_info: I am a husband, father and journalist. I tell stories.

lender.name: Kelsey - Charleston, SC
lender.loan_because: I have two great friends who gave me a gift certificate to Kiva as a graduation present and thought it was such a neat way to help others, and I hope that it will be a gift that keeps on giving!
lender.occupational_info: I am in grad school for Speech Pathology

lender.name: peter
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I work providing mental, physical and spiritual health counseling for indigent populations in Summit County Colorado.

lender.name: Kim & Brad
lender.loan_because: because it is a great idea!
lender.occupational_info: we are studio potters & own a contemporary craft gallery which features primarily North American craft artists as well as work from select fair trade organizations. (our website is still in the early stages...please check back again!)

lender.name: Dominic
lender.loan_because: Each invester individually can make a difference. I have been blessed!

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I like to see others succeed and improve the quality of their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Through my website Natural Living for Women I explore ways to live more naturally from our skin care to our home. I focus on knowing how to make safer more natural choices for ourselves and families but also caring about who and what is affected when our products are made.

lender.name: Grace
lender.loan_because: of the difference that a loan can make in someone's life. Because what seems like next to nothing can mean the world to someone else.

lender.name: carol
lender.loan_because: it is a way to make a difference.

lender.name: Miller Family
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to bypass bureaucracy and help in a direct way people around the world that have been affected by the lop-sided wealth distribution in our world.

lender.name: Sugato
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Jody and Jenna
lender.occupation: Jody is a journalist and Jenna is a student
lender.loan_because: We loan because we see the direct results of our loans, and we like the idea of helping people who are working so hard to help themselves.

lender.name: yvonne and luke
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering people to offer them the opportunity to create a better life for themselves, their families and their society.
lender.occupational_info: I love volunteering (especially with my dog, Luke).....I have traveled to many countries and love the cultural diversity. We can accomplish so much working from the inside out, and allowing people to make their own decisions and create their own destiny. ..

lender.name: courtney
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering people to help themselves.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because:
Microfinance really works and because I want to make the most difference I can.
Because being able to take out a loan, and especially being able to take out a loan without a really high interest rate, can make such a difference. It can make it so much easier to invest in the future and to build stronger, healthier, more secure, more sustainable families, communities, and economies.
We have a lot of investing for the future to do. Access to capital is an important piece of the puzzle.
lender.occupational_info: I just graduated from university. I studied environmental studies. I want to work with people finding community solutions to problems.

lender.name: Howard
lender.loan_because: It's too far to visit and I can't think of anything that makes a bigger difference in the world than helping its passengers.
lender.occupational_info: I hope to use law to improve prople's lives, help families be together, protect the weak, and rein in the strong.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of microloans and web sites like Kiva.org that, used together, allow people living in more prosperous countries to connect with true small-business entrepreneurs we would otherwise not be able to help in such a direct manner.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a social worker studying to be a researcher and teacher so that I can become a better advocate for my fellow human beings.

lender.name: Nackesha
lender.loan_because: "To whom much is given, much is required."

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: I have been lucky enough to be a citizen of a prosperous and free country. I am privileged to be able to share that prosperity with others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a psychologist who works with people who have been abused to help them heal from their painful memories.

lender.name: Barney
lender.loan_because: I am able and others can benefit.
lender.occupational_info: Serving in the way of Jesus.

lender.name: Milene
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: VICKIE
lender.loan_because: I raised 2 sons of whom I am very proud . The thought that I could reach out to help in some small way brings me happiness.With world food prices I also add extra items to my cart to take to local food banks.One person can make a diffrence.Help even a little bit helps

lender.name: matthew
lender.loan_because: just thought I might help out,
lender.occupational_info: just working around the house, and trying to keep it up...

lender.name: E&T
lender.loan_because: It is exciting to be able to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: it's the very least I can do.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student pursuing a masters degree in library and information management with a strong interest in anti-poverty work, human rights and social justice. Eventually I plan on attending law school and build a career doing anti-poverty legal work on both a local and transnational level.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: I loan to give entrepreneur’s that need support a break.
lender.occupational_info: I work to help make the world markets more transparent and fair to investors.

lender.name: Steve - Shellie
lender.loan_because: We believe that everyone is connected and it is our responsibility to help those who need it.
lender.occupational_info: Steve is a Juvenile Court Judge. He hears cases regarding childrens & familiy issues. Shellie is a Parent Mentor for a local school district. She works with families who have children with disabilities.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women who need money to achieve their dreams. Quisiera ayudar a otras mujeres quien necesitan dinero a realizar sus sueños.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer, poet, and translator. I work as a computer programmer and web developer, and sometimes as a teacher. Soy escritora, poeta, traductora. Estoy trabajando con computadores y a veces, soy profesora. Buen suerte a Uds. y sus familias...

lender.name: lisa
lender.loan_because: it's good for the world.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I loan because it empowers people and allows them take control of their futures. This leads to greater freedom, independence, and a higher quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: I work to keep the environment clean.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes it possible.

lender.name: Anudeva and Hanna
lender.loan_because: We want to help others fulfill their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Anudeva works with plants and animals and Hanna is a painter.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: Because my faith compels me to embody thankfulness for the amazing resources in my care simply for being born in the US. I do not take that responsibility lightly and loaning money in this way one way to show that thanks.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: I want my money to go directly to Woman.
lender.occupational_info: I run our house and raise our children, while my wife works for money.

lender.name: Ronald
lender.loan_because: Hard working people can use an assist
lender.occupational_info: I provide design services to individuals

lender.name: Sstoz
lender.loan_because: boo usury!
lender.occupational_info: I'm paid to push wrong paper to wrong departments at wrong time using wrong forms.

lender.name: Kushal
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Volunteer.

lender.name: Noob
lender.loan_because: I want to help others succeed in fulfilling their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: As a ferret, I enjoy sleeping half my day away. I then eat and drink some water, play for a few hours, then it is time for sleep again. My work is very easy as a ferret.

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: I see that microfinance truly works and I want to love people through what I have and what I give.

lender.name: Inze
lender.loan_because: I like to travel around the world, and on my trips I encounter a lot of poverty. I like to try and help these people by enabeling them a small loan.

lender.name: Espen
lender.loan_because: I believe this is the most effective way of helping people.
lender.occupational_info: I write for a financial newspaper about business and economy in one of the richest countries in the world.

lender.name: Will & Nick
lender.loan_because: our Didi was a dentist.

lender.name: Fred DeFalco
lender.loan_because: The ability to be a resource to people around the world is very exciting. Kiva makes the Golden Rule easy to fulfill around the world.

lender.name: jeff
lender.loan_because: I believe it can make a difference to others.

lender.name: Emmanuel
lender.loan_because: I want to positively affect lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am into providing personal and corporate websites at a highly affordable rates.

lender.name: Ralph
lender.loan_because: God wants us to help each other.

lender.name: shelagh
lender.loan_because: Here in Canada we have so much, even when we think we don't. Every time you help someone else you help yourself. We are all in this together.

lender.name: Bryan
lender.loan_because: I believe that our calling is to help others. This opportunity allows me to help individuals and families around the world.
lender.occupational_info: My wife and I are pastors of small churches (Lutheran and United Methodist, respectively). Much of our time is spent helping people in need and caring for the hurting.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I've been an entrepreneur all my life and want to support people around the world who are working to better their lives. I've been fortunate to be able to live a secure and comfortable life in the US. I would wish that for all my fellow humans.
lender.occupational_info: Currently I'm retired from real estate sales and development; I still manage a small building. In the past I've had retail stores, done importing, product design, real estate brokerage and development -mostly adaptive re-use of old buildings.

lender.name: Stefan
lender.loan_because: I think entrepreneurs can change the world to a better world. And all payed back loans will be reinvested.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a coach exclusive for entrepreneurs of small and medium enterprises. I'm also author of books and founder of an education-portal for entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Damon
lender.loan_because: everyone's dreams are realized when we invest in each other and not opaque institutions
lender.occupational_info: I decode DNA at my day job I take care of an apartment complex in Oakland California for my evening/community building job I do freelance photography on the side

lender.name: THESTUDENTSCHOOL
lender.loan_because: Our committee fund raises at our high school and contributes to several progressive organizations, one being kiva.
lender.occupational_info: high school students acting on injustice. Microloans as an alternative to the mainstream development model.

lender.name: Antoni & Mary
lender.loan_because: We would like to help those in need.
lender.occupational_info: Antoni maintains computer systems and Mary teaches music to children

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: We are trying to be a responsible business and feel that Kiva.org provides us with an excellent opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: We build and sell modular homes throughout Vermont and Northern New England, providing affordable housing.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I can. It's the right thing to do. It feels good to help someone directly. Each loan is a reminder that in this small world one person can make a difference. I like helping people with a work ethic similar to mine.
lender.occupational_info: I help teachers help children become bilingual.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: These loans are in memory of a friend who understood the need for compassionate strangers in the world. He was gifted, often conflicted, and he tried as hard as he could, which is as much as you can ask of any man. I know he would, without hesitation, help anyone else who was trying hard as well. Starting his own business was very precious to him, and he was proud to help others in this way.

lender.name: Lester
lender.loan_because: Trade is bigger than aid.

lender.name: Karthik
lender.loan_because: I want to share the opportunities I've been handed to those who have the will and determination to succeed with a break.

lender.name: Lawrence
lender.loan_because: It fits my view of how to best match fiscal responsibility and social justice.

lender.name: Bennett
lender.loan_because: Rising tides lift all boats.
lender.occupational_info:
I investigate the workings of life at the single-molecule level.
Consider curing disease or doing bioengineering attempting to fix a refrigerator for which the schematics are unclear and only cover a third of the components. I'm one of the many people fleshing out that manual.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I've been lucky in business and life and would like to help others improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses manage their information.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone who wants to better themselves, their family, or their community deserves the opportunity to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that allows people anywhere in the world to trade directly with anyone else using the Internet. I protect this virtual community founded on commerce

lender.name: Dianne
lender.loan_because: I have been very lucky in my life, and want to give something back! I enjoy contributing to a program that empowers individuals and also makes the world feel like a more intimate, optimistic place. This is such a wonderful idea actualized!
lender.occupational_info:
I work for Leah's Pantry Inc., a non-profit organization that provides free nutrition workshops for people living in transitional, affordable and emergency housing shelters. I help organize our workshops throughout California and facilitate workshops in San Francisco.
www.leahspantry.org

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: It's the next best thing to being able to travel and help others around the world

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I am fortunate to work for a large computer company, so I get the opportunity to work with a lot of modern technology.

lender.name: La Luna Center
lender.loan_because: I'm all for women owned small businesses!
lender.occupational_info: Business administration.

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: I may not be able to have a big impact on the world, but I can have a big impact in the lives of the people I loan to. Serving justice, serving others.
lender.occupational_info: As the Director of the Pro Bono Program at Georgetown Law, I get paid to encourage others to volunteer. What a job!

lender.name: Elen
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. Everyone should help out when they can.To be able to help someone help themselves is a great feeling
lender.occupational_info: I develop new natural foods

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I've been fortunate in my small wall covering installation business, and want to help out someone else, especially in parts of the world were it's not so easy to get help. I'm very happy to be able to do something in this way!
lender.occupational_info: I install (hang) wall coverings for clients in home, yachts and businesses

lender.name: Adam
lender.occupational_info: I teach and research mathematics at Michigan State University.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I have so much and so many are in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a professor at a small college

lender.name: Eugene
lender.loan_because: I want to help hard-working people in poor countries to make a better life for themselves, and in so doing I hope to make personal contact with them.
lender.occupational_info: I teach physics (a basic science) and do research at the University of California in Berkeley, California, U.S.A.

lender.name: Bryce
lender.loan_because: my mommy says it is good to help others
lender.occupational_info: I love to laugh

lender.name: Axis
lender.loan_because: -we can -we love Jesus and to show appreciation for what God has given us -people are more important than donkeys -it makes me feel good
lender.occupational_info: we are a group of young people who met every week to laugh together

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I like to think I can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the field of corporate operations for a really interesting biotech startup located near San Francisco, California.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I continue to find that each person here is more deserving of my money than I am

lender.name: Abagail
lender.loan_because: I loan because there is absolutely no reason not to.

lender.name: Adrian Liston
lender.loan_because: Poverty is an economic trap, lending instead of giving allows the same money to help over and over.
lender.occupational_info: I am researching the causes of immune diseases.

lender.name: susan
lender.loan_because: it's only fair.

lender.name: Kyung Hyun
lender.loan_because: I can and want to.
lender.occupational_info: I am a construction consultant that works with people in the construction industry. I help build buildings and housing for people.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: Because it is for the greater good!
lender.occupational_info: Fun and involved.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity in life to improve their situation and micro-lending is the most sustainable way to provide it.
lender.occupational_info: Bilingual education teacher, former Peace Corps volunteer

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I hope I can help
lender.occupational_info: I fly people who are in serious need of medical services because of illness or accident .

lender.name: Hardip
lender.loan_because: I hope to see a real change for those who feel insignificant.

lender.name: elliot
lender.loan_because: it is making a difference....
lender.occupational_info: Manufacturer

lender.name: Sunny
lender.loan_because: I can and I want to help
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer teaching English.

lender.name: Lizzy
lender.loan_because: It counts!

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I believe each person has the ability and power to leave a positive impact on the world. By helping someone in need I feel like I am just one of many people who are doing what they can to change the world for the better one person at a time. There is a great quote from my favorite book, "Buddha Is As Buddha Does," by Lama Surya Das and it says, "May I perfect the sublime virtue of generosity, which liberates and releases craving, grasping, and attachment, and brings joyous contentment."
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to become a nurse. I hope to work as a nurse that travels on the flight-for-life helicopters in situations where patients are so seriously injured that they need to travel to the hospital by air transportation.

lender.name: RICHARD
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do and I want to help others improve their quality of life.

lender.name: The Daleys
lender.occupation: Trying to make the world a better place
lender.loan_because: it's just an extension of what we do.
lender.occupational_info: Teaching, Advocating, Nursing, Rabble-rousing

lender.name: melanie
lender.loan_because: i believe everyone has the right to make a living for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: i help my boss get things done that she does not have time to do, due to running her own business. i run errands, do office work, take care of the kids from time to time, and do other things around the house.

lender.name: St. Raphaels
lender.loan_because: Part of our mission outreach, is to be in solidarity with those who are working to build a better life for themselves and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: Learning and doing the work of Jesus: He came that we might have life and have it abundantly (John 10:10)

lender.name: Shelly
lender.loan_because: small amounts make a big difference in other people's lives
lender.occupational_info: I work on state programs that help low income mothers and children

lender.name: ingrid
lender.loan_because: I know that just a little bit of help can make a huge difference in someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: I coach business executives.

lender.name: jay
lender.loan_because: together we can make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I help people plan vacations.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: A little for me makes a big difference for them.
lender.occupational_info: I help Kiva work with the microfinance banks they partner with

lender.name: CARLOS
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs help! We who have much have a responsibility to help others not just in terms of social economics, but also in terms of supporting their DIGNITY.
lender.occupational_info: I help others learn about the world and themselves while at the same time I learn from them.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: We are all part of this world, and I enjoy playing a small part in it.
lender.occupational_info: I was a police officer for 30 years, and have my PhD in Human Services. Currently a professor of Criminal Justice.

lender.name: Sean
lender.occupational_info:
I help to operate three large telescopes on Mount Wilson, CA.
http://www.ocf.berkeley.edu/~sean

lender.name: the family
lender.loan_because: we want to help
lender.occupational_info: genetic research, health care, study/study/study

lender.name: Lois
lender.loan_because: I have been affected by Muhammed Yunus' work and the bias present in many financial institutions. I believe in the power of women and the importance of their influence on the next generation and i was able to do this with a great friend and our daughters as a group. My initial interest has influenced those close to me and those on the other side of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with musculoskeletal problems improve so they can function and perform activities important to them.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to change their world.
lender.occupational_info: Trying to do a bit of good.

lender.name: Ginger
lender.loan_because: everybody does better when everybody does better!
lender.occupational_info: I help women and children who have been abused.

lender.name: Peter Antypas
lender.loan_because: I believe in bottom-up economic development and have zero faith in corrupt third world governments and foreign "aid"

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: It is a joy to be able to help others. I definitely get more than what I give. I am grateful to have this opportunity to reach out.
lender.occupational_info: Manage the properties and day-to-day operations of a mayor cruise line

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It sure beats spending the money on items I don't need.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired and fortunate enough to have enough money to help others, and pay back what I have been given. Also, I spent many years doing business and other things and now I can devote my time to fine arts and helping others.

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: I want to help. Many people have given me opportunities to succeed, and I want to pass that on to others.

lender.name: Haizu Truong
lender.loan_because: I feel this is a great opportunity to give people around the world a chance to become successful, and I am still working on mine. We both can work together to achievement our goal.
lender.occupational_info:
Beside school and study, I love to help and volunteer because it's the right thing to do.
haizu@mail.com

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because: someday I may need a loan

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: i saw the Frontline episode, and it looked like a good way to help others...

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I have no reason not to
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student at Cal Poly San Luis Obispo

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: How can you not loan once you have read the stories.
lender.occupational_info: I design costumes for movies.

lender.name: Trevor
lender.loan_because: I should
lender.occupational_info: I write and produce hip-hop and breakbeat music.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I loan because I want to help other people safely.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: $200 doesn't mean too much in some countries, but it does in others. It's more fun to assist at a personal level. I think that in some way we are all connected.
lender.occupational_info: I try to fly people safely and efficiently using private jet aircraft. We usually travel in North, South, and Central America.

lender.name: Kit
lender.loan_because: These people can really improve their lives with a little help...and we are able to do that. How great!
